Name: histoplasmosis pericarditis
Definition: An American histoplasmosis that results_in inflammation located_in pericardium

Name: obsolete Bacillus anthracis pneumonia
Definition: A primary Bacillaceae infectious disease involving Bacillus anthracis infection resulting in pulmonary infiltrates and necrosis.

Name: obsolete influenza virus pneumonia
Definition: A viral infectious disease that results_in inflammation located_in lung

Name: constrictive pericarditis
Definition: A bone resorption disease characterized by decreased density of normally mineralized bone which results_in the thinning of bone tissue and decreased mechanical strength.

Name: chronic rheumatic pericarditis
Definition: A bone cancer and jaw disease that is located in the jaw and results in a swollen jaw
Synonym: central giant cell reparative granuloma of jaw

Name: obsolete abortion complicated by metabolic disorder
Definition: A bone cancer and jaw disease that is located in the jaw and results in a swollen jaw
Synonym: central giant cell reparative granuloma of jaw
